item.title: Klock
item.description: Problem In an event-driven system like Kubernetes, access to a resource can be restricted with RBAC. RBAC is not designed to execute a mandatory or exclusive lock on a particular resource. It is not impossible, but I found it complicated and error-prone. Sometimes I want: The CronJob named daily-report is constant. No one can DELETE or UPDATE it. A workload payroll can be modified only by the actor with UID aa-dd-f445-d-55-d and no one else.
